Module com.example.project3rubank
Package com.example.project3rubank

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3rubank.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
This class manages the user interactions for the JavaFX application. It connects the UI interactions with their underlying logic.

  • Method Details

    • hideElements

      private void hideElements(AccountType type)
      This method disables the UI elements depending on the account type.
      Parameters:
      type - The selected account type.

    • changeAccountTypeFormat

      private String changeAccountTypeFormat(AccountType type)
      Converts the account type from an enum to a string representation.
      Parameters:
      type - The specified account type.
      Returns:
      The string representation of the account type.

    • setUpButtons

      private void setUpButtons()
      Private helper method that connects the UI buttons to their specific methods.

    • openAccount

      private void openAccount(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is the implementation of the O command, gets user input and validates it to open an account.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the open account event

    • createAccount

      private Account createAccount(AccountDatabase accountDB, AccountType type, Branch branch, Profile profile, double initialDeposit, int term)
      This method actually creates the account of the user from the O command, based off the type of account they make.
      Parameters:
      accountDB - the database of the accounts, to check if a user already has a checking account
      type - the account type to compare to, to create the correct type of account
      branch - the branch of where the user wants to create the account
      profile - the profile details of the user to create the account
      initialDeposit - the initial amount the user wants to deposit
      term - the term of the CD account
      Returns:
      returns the account object of the user, of the correct type

    • convertCampus

      private Campus convertCampus(String campusInput)
      Converts the campus from the user input to the enum value
      Parameters:
      campusInput - the user input to convert
      Returns:
      returns the correct campus relative to user input.

    • hasChecking

      private boolean hasChecking(AccountDatabase accountDB, Profile profile)
      This method is a helper method for creating an account and checks if a savings account being made has a checking account as well
      Parameters:
      accountDB - the account database to traverse from
      profile - the profile to compare
      Returns:
      returns true if it has a checking account, otherwise false

    • findDuplicateAccount

      private Account findDuplicateAccount(AccountDatabase accountDB, Profile profile, AccountType type, int term)
      This is a private helper method for checking duplicate accounts when a user tries to open an account
      Parameters:
      accountDB - the database to get accounts
      profile - the profile to compare
      type - the account type to compare
      term - the term to compare for CD accounts
      Returns:
      returns the account if theirs a duplicate, null otherwise.

    • deposit

      private void deposit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the D command (deposit)
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • closeAccountByNumber

      private void closeAccountByNumber(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Closes the account based on the account number and closing date
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event triggered by user interaction.

    • closeAllAccounts

      private void closeAllAccounts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Closes all accounts associated with a user's profile.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user interaction.

    • removeLoyalStatus

      private void removeLoyalStatus(AccountDatabase accountDB, Profile holder)
      This is a helper method for closing an account, where if a user closes a checking account, and they also have a savings account, it removes the loyal status.
      Parameters:
      accountDB - the account database to traverse from
      holder - the holder to compare

    • calculateInterestClosing

      private double calculateInterestClosing(Account account, Date close)
      This method is a helper method for closing an account, it calculates the interest at closing of non-CD accounts.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to compare the account type
      close - the close date, to get the day of the date
      Returns:
      returns the interest of non-CD accounts using the formula

    • printByBranch

      private void printByBranch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the PB command.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user interaction.

    • printActivities

      private String printActivities(File file) throws IOException
      This method prints the activities that were processed in accountDB
      Parameters:
      file - the file used to process the activities
      Returns:
      returns the stringbuilder that prints out the activities
      Throws:
      IOException - exception handler to handle the file

    • loadActivities

      private void loadActivities(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This methods loads the activities from the selected file.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user interaction.

    • notifications

      private void notifications(String message, boolean success)
      Displays a temporary notification based on the user's actions.
      Parameters:
      message - The message displayed in the notification.
      success - If true, the notification is green. Otherwise, the notification is red.

    • alert

      private void alert(String message, boolean success)
      This method displays an alert to tell the user whether their action was successful or unsuccessful.
      Parameters:
      message - The message displayed by the alert.
      success - If true, the alert is an information dialog, else it's an error dialog.

    • changeBranch

      private String changeBranch(Branch branch)
      This changes the branch selection after clearing fields.
      Parameters:
      branch - the branch to switch to
      Returns:
      returns the branch

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller when the FXML file is loaded.
